scripts.test:rollup: npm run setup:rollup && npm run test:rollup:es && npm run test:rollup:cjs
scripts.test:wp4: npm run setup:wp4 && node bundle.js && shx rm bundle.js
scripts.test:wp5: npm run setup:wp5 && node bundle.js && shx rm bundle.js
scripts.test:webpack: npm run test:wp4 && npm run test:wp5
scripts.test: npm run test:rollup && npm run test:webpack
